settings.custom_liquid: Add 3-year protection plan for $500 (US customers only). See plan details.

settings.text: A $480.52 Flat Rate Shipping charge will be applied at checkout (lower US 48 states) - 4x4 machines are in stock and ship in 1-3 business days.

1. A Workbench. Rated to support more than 350 lbs. of weight.

  • For the 4'x4' X-Carve Pro we recommend a 6'x6' workbench.
  • For the 4'x2' X-Carve Pro we recommend a 6'x3' workbench.
2. A Computer to Run Easel Pro. Check the system requirements.

Other bits are not included, you can shop for additional bits here

If you have any question, visit our X-Carve Pro FAQ's page.

settings.title: Features
settings.text:
• 48in x 48in x 4in work envelope
  • 2hp air-cooled VFD spindle
  • 1" ball screws and linear guides
  • 1-year limited warranty

settings.title: Benefits
settings.text:
• Carve 4' wide and infinite feet long
  • Up and carving in under 4 hours
  • Plugs into standard 120V outlet. Not compatible with GFI/GFCI outlets.
  • Fast Assembly

settings.heading: Sign up for the latest on the X-Carve Pro.
